title: Navajo National Monument: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets are not allowed on walking trails unless they are a service animal. Pets are allowed in the parking lot and campground areas, but they have to be kept on a leash at all times. Please clean up after your pets and do not leave pets unattended for long periods of time. Do not leave pets inside vehicle with windows rolled up during the summer months.
